comments.raw_text:
http://mcpherrin.ca/intern-christmas/

The interns left us an awesome holiday card and alas the snow falls faster in Chrome than in the FFx.  Can we speed up this snowfall, the 2012 interns deserve a white holiday.

Steps to reproduce:
* Open http://mcpherrin.ca/intern-christmas/ in FFx
* Open http://mcpherrin.ca/intern-christmas/ in Chrome

Result:
Slow/choppy rate of accumulation of snow in FFx.

Expected Result:
White-out conditions

comments.text:
I see this on windows current nightly

GC and CC speed don't change substantially.  although CC for some seconds,intially jumps from 60ms to 100ms+  

I'm guessing graphics.
